title: Choosing the Right Transport Protocol: TCP vs. UDP vs. QUIC
author: Ron Northcutt
description: A decision-making framework breaking down the strengths, weaknesses and ideal use cases to help users choose the proper protocol for their systems.
cntitle: 选择合适的传输协议：TCP 与 UDP 与 QUIC
cndescription: 一个决策框架，它分解了各种协议的优缺点和理想用例，以帮助用户为其系统选择合适的协议。
